name: Cowboy: Attack of Wild Animal
description:
Cowboy : Attack of Wild animals is to avoid wild animals attacking the owner. You can avoid a dangerous moment by rushing or get over a crisis by hunting animals with a gun. Do not stop and keep moving! Then you will survive in the wild.

  • -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Main Features■ Single Mode■ Competition Mode(single)■ Mulit Mode■ Hide and Seek Mode■ Various Obstacle■ Upgrade
  • -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
